connection_error_message: Warning: unable to connect to the server. Your last modifications may not be saved. Please check your connection status.
sync_error_msg: Warning, synchronization failure, your last modifications may not be saved.
treeview_unable_remove_root: Objects at the root cannot be removed
treeview_unable_remove_there: This object cannot be removed from there
treeview_unable_remove_rights: You don't have the right to remove this object
treeview_confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove
treeview_warning_access: You have moved/copied an item, the access settings have been reset. Please check them in the 'Access and Validation' panel.
